titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the People's Republic of China should release immediately the crew members of the United States Navy EP-3E Aries II reconnaissance aircraft that made an emergency landing on the Chinese island of Hainan on April 1, 2001, and should release immediately and intact that aircraft in accordance with international law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Calls for the Government of the People's Republic of China to release immediately the U.S. Navy EP-3E Aries II reconnaissance aircraft and crew members that made an emergency landing on the Chinese island of Hainan on April 1, 2001.
